about_the_game:
Unlock 508 puzzles depicting great paintings!

These paintings are found in museums throughout the world, but you can make these puzzles from the comfort of your home, on your own or with friends and family.

Among the many artists represented you'll find:

Leonardo da Vinci
Van Gogh
Rembrandt
Degas
Vermeer
Monet
Klimt
Munch
Seurat
...and many dozens more!

In addition to unlocking 508 unique puzzles, this Super Pack also comes with 5 puzzle credits so you can unlock some more of your choosing.

This pack combines the Puzzle Together packages "Museum Architecture", "Museum Landscapes", "Museum Nature", "Museum Portraits", "Museum Scenes", and "Museum Still Lifes". This is a $76.94 value if purchased individually in-game -- plus you'll receive $3.99 worth of puzzle credits.

Put on some classical music, pick a great painting and enjoy some relaxing puzzle time!

Here are just a few of the puzzle images included in this pack:

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13
  • Processor: ARMv7 with Neon Support (32-bit) or ARM64
